sect1.title: Test design
sect1.para: This section describes how to develop a new test and run it.

sect1.title: Strategy
sect1.para:
Update Information
When the development of a test starts, the testers shall be sure that the information that are using is updated. To ensure this, the command "python update_info.py" must be run. Generate the java test
To generate the java test, the following command shall be invoked "python app.py name_of_the_test". If no error message is displayed, the java test was generated with no errors and can be run. Else, take a look again the keywords used and make sure that they exist in the html page (case sensitive).
The generated tests can by found in /w_space/pisa/test/pisa/nsvf/ folder.
